experiences.domains: Angular, React, Vue JS, React Native, MEAN, MERN, Laravel, Express JS
experiences.description: Delivered data-driven applications using Angular, React, and Vue.js. Notable projects include Metrics, a data visualization tool for HR, and Hugo, a hospital booking system with video call features. Collaborated on .NET and Django backends for secure and efficient data handling.
Focused on developing chatbot management dashboards using React JS and Socket.io. Built interactive UI elements and facilitated chatbot analytics for improved performance.

experiences.domains: Bootstrap 5, Angular JS, React, Vue JS, Laravel
experiences.description: Specialized in various frontend frameworks, including React, Angular, and Vue. Worked on hybrid apps using Ionic and full-stack MEAN applications. Contributed to Ruby on Rails and Laravel projects on freelance platforms.
Designed and developed HTML websites for Django-based products, improving UI aesthetics and user interaction.
